<rule id="springboot-shell-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="spring-shell-core" groupId="org.springframework.shell"/>
                </project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="3" title="Replace the SpringBoot Shell artifact with Quarkus 'picocli' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the SpringBoot Shell artifacts with Quarkus `picocli` extension

                        Add Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-picocli`

                        PicoCli provides command-line mode like Spring Shell but does not reuse the Spring interfaces
                        therefore re-coding is also required to use the appropriate PicoCli interfaces.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/picocli" title="Quarkus Command Mode with Picocli Guide"/>
                    <link href="https://spring.io/projects/spring-shell/" title="Spring Shell Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
